title: This metric finds All-Stars BEFORE they blow up

hook.text:
What if you could spot the next All-Star before anyone else?

[On-screen: "FIND STARS EARLY 💎"]

This is how I do it with PVR...

explanation.text:
Look for: High PVR (30+) + Low TUSG% (<25%) = Hidden gem

Why? They're EFFICIENT but underused.

[Show quadrant: High PVR, Low Usage = Breakout Candidate]

These players produce at elite levels WITHOUT the ball. Give them more usage? They explode.

Examples: Jokić before his MVP, Jimmy Butler pre-Chicago, Kawhi pre-Spurs Finals.

example.text:
Current example: Player with 32 PVR, 22 TUSG on limited minutes.

[Show: League average = 15 PVR, 20 TUSG]

They're doing MORE with LESS. That's your next breakout star.

cta.text:
Want this season's hidden gems list? Link in bio. Follow to spot stars before the hype.

[End screen: "ANALYTICS SEE THE FUTURE 🔮"]

trending_sounds: original sound (use trending audio from FYP)
tips: Use text overlays for key stats and formulas
Keep energy high - fast cuts, dynamic visuals
Test different hooks for best performance
